Build Path

Fix dropped for HEAD and will be tagged for the I-build shortly.

I'm curious how you got in this situation though. Did you do something like
delete a runtime recently, move up to a new build (where I might have changed an
id), or pull in an old project from CVS? It looks like the project's build path
is pointing to a runtime that no longer exists - if this sounds incorrect then
please let me know or open another bug if you can determine the circumstances,
so that we can investigate that issue as well.

Yes, I moved to another computer with different runtime configurations.

I hope, closing this bug means you added message dialog, that shows what 
runtime is missing. It will help :)
Closing old bugs that haven't had any activity in a couple months. If this problem has not been verified or you still have problems, please open a new bug.
